overview.competition_level: Generally less than US (not all US sellers active)

ranking_importance.mobile_factor: Users especially unlikely to scroll deep

seasonality.current_trend: Dropping (January) but will pick up seasonally

sand_filter_pump.supply_status: Gap - specific replacement not widely available
sand_filter_pump.key_spec: GPH (gallons per hour) rating for matching

launch_timing.rationale: Hit seasonal window when category picks up
launch_timing.risk: Late April arrival is late for peak spring season start

kids_toddler.opportunity: Big brands have terrible Amazon listings (poor SEO, weak images)

competitive_dynamics.amazon_buyer_behavior: Care more about photo quality than brand names (unless specifically searching brand)
competitive_dynamics.premium_positioning: Visible quality (photos show construction, safety) justifies premium

challenges.insurance: $5M minimum liability coverage required by major retailers
challenges.provider_concern: Not keen on trampolines or children's inflatables

coleman_challenges: Competitors have better listings and features

market_entry_barrier.blocker: Brand approval required from trademark holder
market_entry_barrier.chicken_egg: Need PO to get approval, need approval to get PO

coleman_camping.strategic_value: Retail relationship maintenance, obligation to small/medium customers

methods: Undervalue or reclassify items to avoid tariffs
chinese_sellers.impact: Creates pricing pressure for legitimate sellers operating above board

big_brand_weakness.opportunity: Amazon buyers prioritize visual presentation over brand (unless brand-searching)

fba_vs_fbm.conversion_opportunity: FBM to FBA = ~60% improvement in success rate

coupon_usage.purpose: Lower customer-facing price without changing list price
coupon_usage.benefit: Win buy box while maintaining price parity with retail partners
coupon_usage.mechanics: Amazon calculates fees on post-coupon price

retail_anchor_pricing.risk: Amazon may penalize if significantly higher than CT equivalent

ecosystem_fundamentals.importance: Keywords are fundamental to entire Amazon ecosystem

data_sources.brand_analytics: Amazon allows sellers to pull reports
data_sources.tools_purpose: Reprocess data into manageable, understandable format

immediate_impact: Algorithm rewards external traffic with better organic ranking

search_volume_thresholds.rationale: Higher search volume = more opportunity (if can rank)

honeymoon_period.benefit: Extra traffic from Amazon to gather performance data
honeymoon_period.strategy: Heavy initial marketing investment to capitalize
honeymoon_period.trade_off: Lose existing reviews if creating new listing

create_new_when: Can't improve existing listing due to Amazon restrictions
decision_framework.requirement_for_new: Must relabel product with new UPC (existing UPC tied to old ASIN)

freight_trends.fcl_vs_lcl: Even half of 20ft container sometimes cheaper than LCL

customs_requirements.todd_douae_status: Properly set up, can handle customs directly

identified_gaps.evidence: Weak big-brand listings, parent willingness to pay for quality

emerging_trends.description: Amazon buyers rely more on photos than specs
Securing exclusivity to prevent unauthorized sellers
emerging_trends.implication: Brand protection essential for pricing control

emerging_trends.description: Small retailers ordering via Amazon Business accounts
emerging_trends.implication: External traffic benefits, maintains retail relationships

market_risks.mitigation: Maintain continuous inventory even in small quantities
Focus on differentiation, FBA advantage, brand exclusivity
Use coupons to maintain list price while competing on buy box

market_risks.risk: Insurance costs for certain product types
market_risks.evidence: Provider not keen, $5M minimum liability required

learning_priorities: Track actual sales results vs predictions for Product 58498
Monitor competitor responses to new FBA listings
Validate honeymoon period traffic boost on new launches
Measure TACoS reduction timeline (paid to organic transition)
Assess effectiveness of flat-rate freight allocation
Track stockout recovery difficulty if occurs
